üë∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Work History

DevOps Engineer - Avaya / CTIntegrations

  • Streamlined deployment processes by implementing GitOps with GitHub Actions and ArgoCD, achieving 99.9% deployment success rate and reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes
  • Architected and launched an internal developer platform serving 100+ engineers, enabling self-service infrastructure provisioning across GCP and AWS using Port, Crossplane and ArgoCD, reducing infrastructure request tickets by 85% and cutting resource provisioning time from days to minutes
  • Standardized infrastructure as code practices using Terraform and Crossplane, managing 1000+ cloud resources with 100% compliance and achieving 40% cost optimization through automated resource scheduling

Cloud Support Engineer - Amazon

  • Engineered and maintained Ansible playbooks automating configuration and diagnostics for 1000+ Amazon Lockers, reducing maintenance downtime by 60% and saving 20+ hours weekly in manual troubleshooting
  • Implemented infrastructure as code using Terraform to manage AWS resources across multiple environments, achieving 99% deployment consistency and reducing provisioning time from days to hours
  • Developed Python-based CLI tools and automation scripts that eliminated 30+ hours of manual work weekly, enabling engineers to self-serve common tasks like log analysis, access management, and environment setup

Systems Administrator - HealthTronics

  • Orchestrated configuration management for 200+ Linux and Windows servers using Ansible, achieving 99.9% uptime and reducing patch deployment time from days to hours across multiple AWS regions
  • Automated employee onboarding/offboarding workflows using Python and PowerShell, reducing processing time from 4 hours to 15 minutes while enforcing role-based access controls
  • Designed and implemented Python automation framework integrating 15+ third-party APIs (Jira, Slack, ServiceNow), eliminating 25+ hours of manual tasks weekly and standardizing data flow between systems

Support Engineer - Arrive Logistics

  • Engineered suite of Python and PowerShell automation tools that eliminated 30+ hours of manual tasks weekly, including user provisioning, log analysis, and system health checks
  • Architected and maintained Ansible playbooks managing 100+ Linux and Windows servers, achieving 99.9% configuration compliance and reducing system updates from days to hours
  • Revolutionized user provisioning by automating 90% of onboarding/offboarding workflows using Python and PowerShell, ensuring consistent access management

Portfolio Website

Dotfiles

Architected modular dotfiles management system featuring declarative configurations for modern development tools including Neovim, Tmux, and multiple shells (Fish, Nushell). Leveraged Nix and Nix-Darwin for reproducible environment setup, ensuring consistent development experience across any MacBook.

  • lowranceworks/dotfiles

MacBook Configuration with Ansible

Developed comprehensive MacBook configuration automation using Ansible, enabling rapid workstation setup and disaster recovery with 50+ software configurations, dotfiles, and OS preferences. Reduced new machine setup time from days to hours while ensuring consistent development environments.

  • lowranceworks/macbook-config

Geo-Redundant Storage Infrastructure

Engineered fault-tolerant data backup infrastructure using TrueNAS, implementing ZFS replication between geographically distributed sites for disaster recovery. Enabled secure cross-site data synchronization with end-to-end encryption.
